#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,k,p,sum;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        sum=0;
        cin>>n>>k;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>p;
            sum+=p;
        }
        if(sum<=k)
            cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"No"<<endl;
    }
}
